user.title: Danfoss Eco setup
user.description: Select a thermostat that is nearby. {scan_hint}

pair.title: Pair device
pair.description: Press the thermostat button once to enter pairing mode, then click Submit to retrieve the secret key.

error.pairing_failed: Failed to retrieve the secret key. Ensure the device is in pairing mode and try again.
error.not_etrv: Discovered device is not a Danfoss Eco thermostat.
error.timeout_connect: Connection timed out. Ensure the device is in pairing mode and within range, then try again.
error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to the device. Ensure the device is in pairing mode and try again.

abort.already_in_progress: Configuration is already in progress. If a previous setup failed, restart Home Assistant and try again.
